Trading Performance Analysis Report
================================

Analysis Approach:
1. Data Processing:
   - Processed trade history from multiple portfolios
   - Classified trades by position type (long/short, open/close)
   - Calculated realized profits and losses

2. Key Metrics Calculated:
   - Return on Investment (ROI)
   - Profit and Loss (PnL)
   - Sharpe Ratio (Risk-adjusted returns)
   - Maximum Drawdown (MDD)
   - Win Rate and Position Analysis

Key Findings:
- Total Portfolios Analyzed: 149
- Average Win Rate: 37.30%
- Average ROI: 1.03%
- Best ROI: 12.18%
- Average Sharpe Ratio: 0.61
